definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It was an autumn night in my native Nova Scotia.
sentences.chinese: 時值秋夜，在我的故鄉新斯科舍。

sentences.english: The colony of Nova Scotia was divided into Nova Scotia and New Brunswick.
sentences.chinese: 新斯科舍和新布倫斯威克。

sentences.english: I grew up in the LaHave River Valley of Nova Scotia far from any town.
sentences.chinese: 我從小在拉哈夫河流域新斯科舍遠離任何城市。

sentences.english: I'm a tomboy from Nova Scotia .
sentences.chinese: 我是來自新斯科舍的假小子。

sentences.english: The British troops then moved to Nova Scotia.
sentences.chinese: 之後，英軍轉移到新斯科舍。

sentences.english: Wind across the prairies and off the east coast of Nova Scotia can generate electricity.
sentences.chinese: 草原地區和新斯科舍東部海岸的風力可用來發電。
